id, article_type AS articleType, mtitle,sub_heading AS subHeading, icon, main_img AS mainImg, article_tag AS articleTag, top_status AS topStatus, weight_top AS weightTop, release_status AS releaseStatus, article_detail AS articleDetail, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, release_time AS releaseTime
mapper.insert:
insert into article
article_type,
mtitle,
sub_heading,
icon,
main_img,
article_tag,
top_status,
weight_top,

article_detail,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update article
article_type = #{articleType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mtitle = #{mtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_heading = #{subHeading,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_img = #{mainImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
article_tag = #{articleTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
top_status = #{topStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
weight_top = #{weightTop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
release_status = #{releaseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_detail = #{articleDetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
